div.head: 腹內鐘鳴
div.div: a bell ringing in the abdomen

bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

entry.def: a bell ringing in the abdomen

sense.def: Pathological Condition identical with tai ti 胎啼 , fetal cry. Fu ren da quan liang Gynecological book. Southern Song fang era, 1237. 婦人大全良方 15: 治孕婦腹內鐘鳴。用鼠 窟前后土為細末，研麝香，酒調下二錢，其疾立愈 , “To cure a bell ringing in a pregnant woman’s abdomen use a fine powder prepared from the soil surrounding a rat hole, grind she xiang , and ingest 2 qian of [these two ingredients] mixed with wine. The ailment will be healed immediately”.
